type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.eclipse.EclipseBuildCommand

method.name: getArguments
method.description:
The arguments supplied for the build command.

Corresponds to the org.eclipse.core.resources.ICommand#getBuilderName() method in the Eclipse platform API. @see Definition of ICommand#getArguments() in the Eclipse documentation

returns:The arguments map. If no arguments supplied then returns an empty map.

method.name: getName
method.description:
Returns the name of the build command.

Corresponds to the org.eclipse.core.resources.ICommand#getBuilderName() method in the Eclipse platform API. @see Definition of ICommand#getBuilderName() in the Eclipse documentation

returns:The name of the build command. Does not return null.

property.name: arguments
property.description:
The arguments supplied for the build command.

Corresponds to the org.eclipse.core.resources.ICommand#getBuilderName() method in the Eclipse platform API. @see Definition of ICommand#getArguments() in the Eclipse documentation

returns:The arguments map. If no arguments supplied then returns an empty map.

property.name: name
property.description:
Returns the name of the build command.

Corresponds to the org.eclipse.core.resources.ICommand#getBuilderName() method in the Eclipse platform API. @see Definition of ICommand#getBuilderName() in the Eclipse documentation

returns:The name of the build command. Does not return null.
